name: Tommy's Tires
description: A demonstration of Okta's Social Auth API.

OKTA_URL.description: The URL for your Okta org, it MUST NOT end in '/'. For example: https://example.oktapreview.com

OKTA_TOKEN.description: The API token for your Okta org

OKTA_REDIRECT.description: Where Okta should redirect users once they've finished social auth. This will be the URL for your site, ending in '/social_auth_processing'
